message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DC, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the extension of a learning framework to a distributed setting, which is a common topic in the machine learning community (cs.LG). The specific framework studied, Learning from Constraints (LfC), is related to optimization and inference, which are also topics in the machine learning community. The paper also mentions digit recognition and document classification, which are tasks in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.DC), respectively. Finally, the paper mentions the use of constraints as a way to bridge what is shared over the network and what is private to each node, which is related to distributed systems (cs.SY) and privacy-preserving machine learning (cs.AI).
